greeting.text: Halt! ...Oh, sorry about that. Old habits. I'm Sam, head of security. Do you have your visitor badge?

badge-check.text: Let me see... *examines badge* ...Looks good! You're cleared for all public areas. The arcade and restricted zones require special access, though.

options.text: How do I get special access?

special-access.text: Talk to Drew in the arcade about daily challenges. Complete enough tasks and you might earn higher clearance. Or... you know... just be nice to people. Works wonders around here.

no-badge.text: No badge? Hmm... Well, you look trustworthy enough. But you'll need to get one from Morgan in HR. They're in the office area. Can't have you wandering around without proper ID - rules are rules.

options.text: I'll go get one right now

hr-directions.text: Head east to the office area. Morgan's desk is the one with all the plants and the 'World's Best HR' mug. Can't miss it - they're the only one who actually waters their plants.

access-info.text: With a standard visitor badge, you can access the lobby, office areas, meeting center, and lounge-cafe. The server room and executive wing are off-limits. And the arcade... well, that's complicated.

arcade-secret.text: *lowers voice* Between you and me, the arcade has some... unusual energy. Drew runs things there. Just be careful - some of those challenges are intense. I've seen people spend hours trying to beat the high scores.

options.text: Sounds exciting! Thanks for the heads up.

passing-through.text: Alright then, move along. But remember - I'm watching. Not in a creepy way! Just... security watching. Stay safe out there!
